path: To Be Organized/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Weather/Weather.docx
text: The weather systems applications are mainly supported by The Weather Company (WSI) but you will receive calls regarding weather hits on the touch screens and rebooting the machines. Touch screens will have a shortcut to the TUIO app on the desktop, make sure the IP address correlates to the machine they want to use. TUIO must also be running on the playout machine, and the scene must be playing out with touch enabled. If touch does not work, try restarting the TUIO application here.
